mutation of Cl- channel, Cl- channels keep Vm below threshold. When animal wants to carry out muscle action, muscle depolarizes and contracts, without proper Cl- function it keeps depolarizing and, "seizes up" and animal freezes

you would want a long lambda and a short _time constant_, but Tau = Cm*Rm and lambda = Rm/Ri

column1: What is the role of myelin
